New Records: Mohammed Shami became the highest wicket-taker for India in ODI World Cups.
India's 302-run victory is now their biggest win in one-day internationals.
Mohammed Shami equaled Mitchell Starc's tally for most five-wicket hauls in World Cups.
Key Match Events: Mohammed Shami picked up five wickets.
Jasprit Bumrah struck with the first ball of the innings.
Mohammed Siraj picked three wickets in his first two overs.
India bowled out Sri Lanka for 55 runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India became the first team to reach the semifinals of the 2023 World Cup.
India are the only undefeated team in the tournament so far.
Sri Lanka's total of 55 runs is the 4th lowest innings total in World Cups.
